## conversionOptions type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type conversionOptions = {
    globals?: GlobalsWithStrings;
    precision?: number;
    toCanonicalUnits?: boolean;
    censorIntoStandardRepresentableValues?: boolean;
    rawPercentages?: boolean;
    randomCaching?: {
        propertyName: string;
        propertyN: number;
        elementID: string;
        documentID: string;
    };
};
```
